sentences.en: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.
sentences.cn: 我有一种错觉，他要娶我。

sentences.en: Insinuations about her mental state, about her capacity for delusion, were being made.
sentences.cn: 当时有对她的精神状态的影射——说她有妄想症的影射。

sentences.en: Granted, some amount of delusion is probably part of the human condition.
sentences.cn: 当然，一定程度的妄想可能是人类状况的一部分。
